text: @NYGovCuomo What ASSURANCE do THE PEOPLE OF NEW YORK STATE have that the Covid-19 tests you’re making MANDATORY for healthcare workers, to negate your adequacies, are NOT CONTAMINATED as you infringe upon our CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT to LIFE & LIBERTY?
